other_tests.findings: Positive for M. bovis resistant to isoniazid, rifampin, pyrazinamide, ethambutol, streptomycin, para-aminosalicylic acid, clarithromycin, cycloserine, ethionamide, ofloxacin, capreomycin, and amikacin.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Six weeks later, Lo Â¨wenstein culture of a sputum specimen was negative for mycobacteria.
The same M. bovis strain was isolated at baseline.

other_tests.findings: Underwent surgical resection of the lung nodule (posterior segmentectomy) and the thoracic mass.
other_tests.changes_over_time: No clinical or radiological signs of relapse during the 20 months after discharge.
